				arg="
					sp=sort
					dp=sort
					ml=25
					fi=sort.asc
					ra=yes
					rf=f1,f2,f3,f4,f5,f6
					tf=f1,f2,f3,f4,f5,f6
					"]
[set out][search-list][item-pos 0][item-pos 1][item-pos 2][item-pos 3][item-pos 4][item-pos 5]
[/search-list][/set]Search: 
[scratch out]
[more-list]
[more]
[/more-list]
[/search-region]
[page sort]Rerun[/page]
Comparision: [perl] @items = grep /\S/, split /\n/, $Scratch->{out}; @test = sort @items; for ($i = 0; $i < $#items; $i++) { $items[$i] le $items[$i+1] and next; return "error at element $i"; } return "Compared sort OK.\n"; [/perl]
